## Vector4.multiplyToRef() method

Updates the given vector "result" with the multiplication result of the current Vector4 and the given one.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
multiplyToRef(otherVector: ReadOnlyVector4, result: Vector4): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  otherVector | <code>ReadOnlyVector4</code> | vector to multiple with |
|  result | <code>Vector4</code> | vector to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector4`

the current Vector4.
